text: Group G of the 2018 FIFA World Cup will take place from 18 to 28 June 2018. The group consists of Belgium, Panama, Tunisia, and England. The top two teams will advance to the round of 16. ==Teams== Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best Group G will advance to play the runners-up of Group H. * The runners-up of Group G will advance to play the winners of Group H. ==Matches== All times listed are local time. ===Belgium vs Panama=== {|
